mapper.select: select c.id comment_id, c.content, c.topic_id, c.create_time, c.update_time, cu.id as author_user_id, name as author_name, avatar as author_avatar, (select count(*) from comment_like cl where cl.comment_id = c.id) as like_count, (select count(*) from comment cc where cc.parent_id = c.id) as comment_count, c.user_id = #{userId} as mine, (select count(*) from comment_like cl where cl.comment_id = c.id and cl.user_id = #{userId}) = 1 as `like` from comment c inner join user cu on c.user_id = cu.id where c.topic_id = #{topicId} and c.parent_id is null order by like_count desc, c.update_time desc
